mapper.update: update db_returnreason set 'NAME' = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPER = #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERTIME = #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, OPENFLAG = #{openflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE1 = #{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE2 = #{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE3 = #{reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DESCR = #{descr,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where SID = #{sid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select SID, 'NAME', OPER, OPERTIME, OPENFLAG, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, DESCR from db_returnreason
